title: Paragon eSports Black Looking for Members
body:
Paragon eSports is Looking for Players to fill our Second team "Paragon eSports Black" we are looking for upcoming talent in all positions, Please be aware that a player for Jungle and captain for Paragon Black is under consideration as of posting this.

Paragon Black will Compete along it's "Sister" Team Paragon eSports in Oceanic Tournaments which include Oce Weekly and ACL.

We are looking for players in High Plat through to High Diamond.

Please Fill this Application out and Email me at Paragonesportslol@gmail.com or Add me Ingame at PGN Miracle and Message it through to me.
Application
Age:
Role:
Rank:
Previous Teams:
Competitive Experience:
Short Personal Bio:

We are also looking for a Coach for Paragon eSports Black if interested in this position please add me in game to talk more in depth

- PGN Miracle
Legion Gaming Team
Paragon eSports
General Manager

replies.body:
Age: 17
Role: Jungle
Rank: Plat 3
Previous Team: None
Competitive Experience: None
Personal Bio: Love league of legends, but sometimes solo q can get on your nerves so I really want to join a team to get play competetively

Age: 20
Role: Support
Rank: Diamond 1
Previous Teams: been in several semi-serious teams over the years made Plat 1 or Dia 5 I believe 
Competitive Experience: bfh scrims(back in the day), high elo ranked 5's. That's all that comes to mind unfortunately 
Short Personal Bio: Im a very active/serious gamer when it comes to lol and I desire to compete in pro events one day if all goes well. I hope to find likeminded teammates who also share my dream of being a professional league player

Age: 17
Role: mid
Rank: plat 1
Previous Teams: just casual friend teams
Competitive Experience: Friday fight night 
Short Personal Bio: i'm a very chil player who can play very well from behind and can snowball hard given the chance
